author: ctrl_alt_lulz
content: Hi all! Former Coinbase Cloud Ethereum merge lead. Recently left to focus on creating a startup that helps make widespread decentralized/distributed/solo validator operation a reality in part by creating software that assists and abstracts much of the technical complexity of operations. Would love to have a quick chat with you all at Obol/SSV to learn about what pain points you've seen and experienced and your thoughts on how validator operation can become more decentralized. Not sure which channel this might be best for, could also create a telegram channel for us.

author: alon.ssv.network
content: Hi, would love to chat. DM me
